value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It's that time of year again already,
huh? The summer sun calls again...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Don't tell me you're planning another
one of your get-rich-quick schemes,
Commander Anna...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|N-no! I wasn't planning on selling
Hero swimsuits this year or anything!
Nothing like that—don't be silly!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... You sure about that?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|O-of course! I am Commander of the
Order of Heroes, after all. A scheme
would be...a conflict of interest!$k$pPlus, if the Heroes got the idea that
all I think about is making money...it
could affect their willingness to fight!$k$p$EFace_Pain|I don't need the palace scrutinizing
my every move! I could put my
position as Commander in jeopardy...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Well, it certainly sounds like you've
given it some thought, at least...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That's why I won't be putting out any
new products this time!$k$pC'mon, Anna, you can do this...
Forget all about those sweet piles of
cash. Just think of the smiling faces!$k$p$EFace_Pain|Must...not...scheme!$k$pI can make it through this... It'll be no
problem! No problem at all!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Are you feeling all right, Commander
Anna? You look awfully tense!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Seems her better judgment is facing
an uphill battle against her urge to
earn a profit...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Swim19,Face|Sister! You look... Stunning.$k$p$WmMPID_水着レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Swim19,Face|Thank you, Laevatein. You look
lovely as well. I wish we could stay
just like this forever...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Those swimsuits sure are something...
I bet they'd fetch a pretty penny...$k$p$EFace_Cool|B-but we're not here for the profits!
We've gotta free these Heroes from
their contracts—and that's it!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Swim19,Face|It seems the tide has turned against
us for now... We should retreat. Let's
go, Laevatein.$k$p$WmMPID_水着レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Swim19,Face|As you say, Sister...$k$p$Sbs150|
